Another arrest over alleged serious assault at Gisborne bar https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/31/another-arrest-over-alleged-serious-assault-at-gisborne-bar/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/31/another-arrest-over-alleged-serious-assault-at-gisborne-bar/ 'We are still looking for three others': police Fri, 30 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Police have now made five arrests in relation to an alleged serious assault incident at the Smash Palace bar in the industrial subdivision in early August. They are still keen to receive any cellphone coverage of the incident.
